command.text: select "maintdetailstril"."ln_no" "ln_no" ,"maintdetailstril"."Doc_No" "Doc_No" ,"Doc_"."Notes" "Doc_Notes" ,"Doc_Div_"."Emp_Nmdriver" "Doc_Div_Emp_Nmdriver" ,"Doc_Div_sgm"."sgm_Nm" "Doc_Div_sgmsgm_Nm" ,"Doc_Div_Emp_no1"."Emp_NOt" "Doc_Div_Emp_no1Emp_NOt" ,"Doc_Costcnter_"."Costcntr_Nm" "Doc_Costcnter_Costcntr_Nm" ,"Doc_Costcnter_cost_typ"."Costcntr_Nm" "Doc_Costcnter_cost_typCostcntr_Nm" ,"Doc_reqtype"."reqDesc" "Doc_reqtypereqDesc" ,"Doc_Cstm_"."Cstm_Nm" "Doc_Cstm_Cstm_Nm" ,"Doc_Cstm_Area"."Area_name" "Doc_Cstm_AreaArea_name" ,"Doc_Cstm_Evaluation"."Evaluation_name" "Doc_Cstm_EvaluationEvaluation_name" ,"Doc_Cstm_acc_"."Acc_Nm" "Doc_Cstm_acc_Acc_Nm" ,"Doc_Cstm_Cntry_"."Cntry_Nm" "Doc_Cstm_Cntry_Cntry_Nm" ,"Doc_Cstm_curncy_"."Curncy_Nm" "Doc_Cstm_curncy_Curncy_Nm" ,"Doc_Cstm_TSNEF"."TSNEF_name" "Doc_Cstm_TSNEFTSNEF_name" ,"Doc_Cstm_TSNEFNO1"."TSNEF1_name" "Doc_Cstm_TSNEFNO1TSNEF1_name" ,"Doc_Cstm_Slm_"."Slm_Nm" "Doc_Cstm_Slm_Slm_Nm" ,"maintdetailstril"."Tril_no" "Tril_no" ,"Tril_"."PLAT_No" "Tril_PLAT_No" ,"Tril_Car_Type"."Styl_Nm" "Tril_Car_TypeStyl_Nm" ,"Tril_EMP_"."Emp_Nmdriver" "Tril_EMP_Emp_Nmdriver" ,"Tril_EMP_sgm"."sgm_Nm" "Tril_EMP_sgmsgm_Nm" ,"Tril_EMP_Emp_no1"."Emp_NOt" "Tril_EMP_Emp_no1Emp_NOt" ,"Tril_caseoperationdesc"."caseoperationdesc" "Tril_caseoperationdesccaseoperationdesc" ,"Tril_carclass"."carclassname" "Tril_carclasscarclassname" ,"Tril_Insu_Cmp"."Insu_Cmpname" "Tril_Insu_CmpInsu_Cmpname" ,"Tril_Insu_Cmp1"."Insu_Cmpname" "Tril_Insu_Cmp1Insu_Cmpname" ,"Tril_Insu_Cmp2"."Insu_Cmpname" "Tril_Insu_Cmp2Insu_Cmpname" ,"Tril_kind"."carkinddesc" "Tril_kindcarkinddesc" ,"Tril_kindStyl_"."Styl_Nm" "Tril_kindStyl_Styl_Nm" ,"Tril_carstutus_"."carstutus_name" "Tril_carstutus_carstutus_name" ,"Tril_Car_Colr"."Color_name" "Tril_Car_ColrColor_name" ,"Tril_fuelllevel"."FuellevelDisplayname" "Tril_fuelllevelFuellevelDisplayname" ,"Tril_sgm"."sgm_Nm" "Tril_sgmsgm_Nm" ,"Tril_sgmOpco"."OpcoName" "Tril_sgmOpcoOpcoName" ,"Tril_Guarantee"."Guaranteename" "Tril_GuaranteeGuaranteename" ,"Tril_Insurance_type"."Insurance_name" "Tril_Insurance_typeInsurance_name" ,"Tril_Car_Lik"."Like_name" "Tril_Car_LikLike_name" ,"Tril_padnatureway"."padnatureway" "Tril_padnaturewaypadnatureway" ,"Tril_Fbrct_Cntry"."Cntry_Nm" "Tril_Fbrct_CntryCntry_Nm" ,"Tril_Ownr_"."Ownr_ID" "Tril_Ownr_Ownr_ID" ,"Tril_Ownr_cmp_"."Grp_Nm" "Tril_Ownr_cmp_Grp_Nm" ,"Tril_Cstm_"."Cstm_Nm" "Tril_Cstm_Cstm_Nm" ,"Tril_Cstm_Area"."Area_name" "Tril_Cstm_AreaArea_name" ,"Tril_Cstm_Evaluation"."Evaluation_name" "Tril_Cstm_EvaluationEvaluation_name" ,"Tril_Cstm_acc_"."Acc_Nm" "Tril_Cstm_acc_Acc_Nm" ,"Tril_Cstm_Cntry_"."Cntry_Nm" "Tril_Cstm_Cntry_Cntry_Nm" ,"Tril_Cstm_curncy_"."Curncy_Nm" "Tril_Cstm_curncy_Curncy_Nm" ,"Tril_Cstm_TSNEF"."TSNEF_name" "Tril_Cstm_TSNEFTSNEF_name" ,"Tril_Cstm_TSNEFNO1"."TSNEF1_name" "Tril_Cstm_TSNEFNO1TSNEF1_name" ,"Tril_Cstm_Slm_"."Slm_Nm" "Tril_Cstm_Slm_Slm_Nm" ,"Tril_Sup_"."Sup_Nm" "Tril_Sup_Sup_Nm" ,"Tril_Sup_Acc_"."Acc_Nm" "Tril_Sup_Acc_Acc_Nm" ,"Tril_Sup_sgm"."sgm_Nm" "Tril_Sup_sgmsgm_Nm" ,"Tril_Sup_Cntry_"."Cntry_Nm" "Tril_Sup_Cntry_Cntry_Nm" ,"Tril_Sup_Curncy_"."Curncy_Nm" "Tril_Sup_Curncy_Curncy_Nm" ,"Tril_Tamweelreq"."Tamweeldeatails" "Tril_TamweelreqTamweeldeatails" ,"Tril_TamweelreqCurncy_"."Curncy_Nm" "Tril_TamweelreqCurncy_Curncy_Nm" ,"Tril_TamweelreqCstm_"."Cstm_Nm" "Tril_TamweelreqCstm_Cstm_Nm" ,"Tril_Tamweelreqtasedway"."tasedwayname" "Tril_Tamweelreqtasedwaytasedwayname" ,"maintdetailstril"."complnsid" "complnsid" ,"complns"."complnsdesc" "complnscomplnsdesc" ,"maintdetailstril"."complnsdesc" "complnsdesc" ,"maintdetailstril"."ModifiedBy" "ModifiedBy" ,"maintdetailstril"."ModifiedOn" "ModifiedOn" ,"maintdetailstril"."CreatedBy" "CreatedBy" ,"maintdetailstril"."CreatedOn" "CreatedOn" from "dbo"."maintdetailstril" "maintdetailstril" left join "dbo"."maintncrequest" "Doc_" on "maintdetailstril"."Doc_No" = "Doc_"."Doc_No" left join "dbo"."Cadriver" "Doc_Div_" on "Doc_"."Div_No" = "Doc_Div_"."Emp_No" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "Doc_Div_sgm" on "Doc_Div_"."sgm" = "Doc_Div_sgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."Pyempmfs" "Doc_Div_Emp_no1" on "Doc_Div_"."Emp_no1" = "Doc_Div_Emp_no1"."Emp_No" left join "dbo"."GLcostcntr" "Doc_Costcnter_" on "Doc_"."Costcnter_no" = "Doc_Costcnter_"."Costcntr_No" left join "dbo"."Glcostcentgruop" "Doc_Costcnter_cost_typ" on "Doc_Costcnter_"."cost_typ" = "Doc_Costcnter_cost_typ"."Costcntr_No" left join "dbo"."maintainReqtype" "Doc_reqtype" on "Doc_"."reqtype" = "Doc_reqtype"."reqtype" left join "dbo"."Stcustmr" "Doc_Cstm_" on "Doc_"."Cstm_No" = "Doc_Cstm_"."Cstm_No" left join "dbo"."AreaList" "Doc_Cstm_Area" on "Doc_Cstm_"."AreaNo" = "Doc_Cstm_Area"."AreaNo" left join "dbo"."EvaluationList" "Doc_Cstm_Evaluation" on "Doc_Cstm_"."EvaluationNO" = "Doc_Cstm_Evaluation"."EvaluationNO" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "Doc_Cstm_acc_" on "Doc_Cstm_"."acc_no" = "Doc_Cstm_acc_"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "Doc_Cstm_Cntry_" on "Doc_Cstm_"."Cntry_No" = "Doc_Cstm_Cntry_"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."Stcurncy" "Doc_Cstm_curncy_" on "Doc_Cstm_"."curncy_no" = "Doc_Cstm_curncy_"."Curncy_No" left join "dbo"."stcustmrtasnef" "Doc_Cstm_TSNEF" on "Doc_Cstm_"."TSNEFNO" = "Doc_Cstm_TSNEF"."TSNEFNO" left join "dbo"."stcustmrtasnef1" "Doc_Cstm_TSNEFNO1" on "Doc_Cstm_"."TSNEFNO1" = "Doc_Cstm_TSNEFNO1"."TSNEFNO1" left join "dbo"."Stslsman" "Doc_Cstm_Slm_" on "Doc_Cstm_"."Slm_No" = "Doc_Cstm_Slm_"."Slm_No" left join "dbo"."CarInfom" "Tril_" on "maintdetailstril"."Tril_no" = "Tril_"."Car_No" left join "dbo"."CaCrstyl" "Tril_Car_Type" on "Tril_"."Car_Type" = "Tril_Car_Type"."Styl_No" left join "dbo"."Cadriver" "Tril_EMP_" on "Tril_"."EMP_NO" = "Tril_EMP_"."Emp_No" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "Tril_EMP_sgm" on "Tril_EMP_"."sgm" = "Tril_EMP_sgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."Pyempmfs" "Tril_EMP_Emp_no1" on "Tril_EMP_"."Emp_no1" = "Tril_EMP_Emp_no1"."Emp_No" left join "dbo"."carcaseoperationdesc" "Tril_caseoperationdesc" on "Tril_"."caseoperationdescid" = "Tril_caseoperationdesc"."caseoperationdescid" left join "dbo"."carclass" "Tril_carclass" on "Tril_"."carclass" = "Tril_carclass"."carclass" left join "dbo"."carInsuCmplist" "Tril_Insu_Cmp" on "Tril_"."Insu_Cmp" = "Tril_Insu_Cmp"."Insu_Cmp" left join "dbo"."carInsuCmplist" "Tril_Insu_Cmp1" on "Tril_"."Insu_Cmp1" = "Tril_Insu_Cmp1"."Insu_Cmp" left join "dbo"."carInsuCmplist" "Tril_Insu_Cmp2" on "Tril_"."Insu_Cmp2" = "Tril_Insu_Cmp2"."Insu_Cmp" left join "dbo"."carkindlist" "Tril_kind" on "Tril_"."kind" = "Tril_kind"."carkindid" left join "dbo"."CaCrstyl" "Tril_kindStyl_" on "Tril_kind"."Styl_No" = "Tril_kindStyl_"."Styl_No" left join "dbo"."carstutuslist" "Tril_carstutus_" on "Tril_"."carstutus_no" = "Tril_carstutus_"."carstutus_no" left join "dbo"."Colorlist" "Tril_Car_Colr" on "Tril_"."Car_Colr" = "Tril_Car_Colr"."ColorNo" left join "dbo"."FuellevelDisplay" "Tril_fuelllevel" on "Tril_"."fuelllevel" = "Tril_fuelllevel"."FuellevelDisplayid" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "Tril_sgm" on "Tril_"."sgm" = "Tril_sgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."OpCo" "Tril_sgmOpco" on "Tril_sgm"."OpcoID" = "Tril_sgmOpco"."OpcoIDidentity" left join "dbo"."Guaranteelist" "Tril_Guarantee" on "Tril_"."Guarantee" = "Tril_Guarantee"."Guarantee" left join "dbo"."Insurancetype" "Tril_Insurance_type" on "Tril_"."Insurance_type" = "Tril_Insurance_type"."Insurance_type" left join "dbo"."Likelist" "Tril_Car_Lik" on "Tril_"."Car_Lik" = "Tril_Car_Lik"."LikeNo" left join "dbo"."padnaturewaylist" "Tril_padnatureway" on "Tril_"."padnaturewayid" = "Tril_padnatureway"."padnaturewayid" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "Tril_Fbrct_Cntry" on "Tril_"."Fbrct_Cntry" = "Tril_Fbrct_Cntry"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."Pyownrmf" "Tril_Ownr_" on "Tril_"."Ownr_No" = "Tril_Ownr_"."Ownr_No" left join "dbo"."Pycnstnt" "Tril_Ownr_cmp_" on "Tril_Ownr_"."cmp_no" = "Tril_Ownr_cmp_"."Cmp_No" left join "dbo"."Stcustmr" "Tril_Cstm_" on "Tril_"."Cstm_No" = "Tril_Cstm_"."Cstm_No" left join "dbo"."AreaList" "Tril_Cstm_Area" on "Tril_Cstm_"."AreaNo" = "Tril_Cstm_Area"."AreaNo" left join "dbo"."EvaluationList" "Tril_Cstm_Evaluation" on "Tril_Cstm_"."EvaluationNO" = "Tril_Cstm_Evaluation"."EvaluationNO" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "Tril_Cstm_acc_" on "Tril_Cstm_"."acc_no" = "Tril_Cstm_acc_"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "Tril_Cstm_Cntry_" on "Tril_Cstm_"."Cntry_No" = "Tril_Cstm_Cntry_"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."Stcurncy" "Tril_Cstm_curncy_" on "Tril_Cstm_"."curncy_no" = "Tril_Cstm_curncy_"."Curncy_No" left join "dbo"."stcustmrtasnef" "Tril_Cstm_TSNEF" on "Tril_Cstm_"."TSNEFNO" = "Tril_Cstm_TSNEF"."TSNEFNO" left join "dbo"."stcustmrtasnef1" "Tril_Cstm_TSNEFNO1" on "Tril_Cstm_"."TSNEFNO1" = "Tril_Cstm_TSNEFNO1"."TSNEFNO1" left join "dbo"."Stslsman" "Tril_Cstm_Slm_" on "Tril_Cstm_"."Slm_No" = "Tril_Cstm_Slm_"."Slm_No" left join "dbo"."Stsuplir" "Tril_Sup_" on "Tril_"."Sup_No" = "Tril_Sup_"."Sup_No" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "Tril_Sup_Acc_" on "Tril_Sup_"."Acc_No" = "Tril_Sup_Acc_"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "Tril_Sup_sgm" on "Tril_Sup_"."sgm" = "Tril_Sup_sgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "Tril_Sup_Cntry_" on "Tril_Sup_"."Cntry_No" = "Tril_Sup_Cntry_"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."Stcurncy" "Tril_Sup_Curncy_" on "Tril_Sup_"."Curncy_No" = "Tril_Sup_Curncy_"."Curncy_No" left join "dbo"."Tamweelrequest" "Tril_Tamweelreq" on "Tril_"."Tamweelreqid" = "Tril_Tamweelreq"."Tamweelreqid" left join "dbo"."Stcurncy" "Tril_TamweelreqCurncy_" on "Tril_Tamweelreq"."Curncy_No" = "Tril_TamweelreqCurncy_"."Curncy_No" left join "dbo"."Stcustmr" "Tril_TamweelreqCstm_" on "Tril_Tamweelreq"."Cstm_No" = "Tril_TamweelreqCstm_"."Cstm_No" left join "dbo"."tasedwaylist" "Tril_Tamweelreqtasedway" on "Tril_Tamweelreq"."tasedwayid" = "Tril_Tamweelreqtasedway"."tasedwayid" left join "dbo"."maintnccopmlains" "complns" on "maintdetailstril"."complnsid" = "complns"."complnsid"

field.label: Doc Div Emp no1 Emp N Ot
